# Creating a Plot


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# library 
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

```

Generate your data 

```{r}
# generating data
x <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)
y <- rnorm(100,2,3)

# generating data frame 
MyData <- data.frame(x, y)
glimpse(MyData)
```

Plot your data 

```{r, fig.cap= "My Data Plotted"}
# generating plot 
ggplot(MyData, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point(colour = "blue") + 
  theme_bw() 

```
